testsuite.name: RecipesApplicationTest

testcase.name: start

failure.message:
java.lang.AssertionError: Wrong answer in test #3
The JSON element at path "/directions/0" should equal to "Boil water", found "Add fresh mint leaves"
Full JSON: { "name": "Fresh Mint Tea /Test", "description": "Light, aromatic and refreshing beverage, ... /Test", "ingredients": [ "boiled water", "honey", "fresh mint leaves /Test" ], "directions": [ "Add fresh mint leaves", "Add honey and mix again /Test", "Pour boiling hot water into a mug", "Mix and let the mint leaves seep for 3-5 minutes", "Boil water" ] }
Please find below the output of your program during this failed test.
